message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you a great deal on a fantastic product! It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll really love. Would you like to buy it from me for $120?
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob! I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $110. Would that work for you?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $95. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I'm not willing to go as low as $95, Bob. I'm thinking more along the lines of $105. That's the lowest I can go, but I think it's a fair price for this amazing product.
I understand you're not willing to go as low as $95, but I'm still not comfortable with $105. I'm willing to meet you in the middle, so how about $100?
I'm not willing to meet in the middle at $100, Bob. I'm thinking more along the lines of $110. I'm willing to give you a slight discount, but I need to make a profit on this sale.

I appreciate your willingness to give me a slight discount, but $110 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to make a serious offer of $92. If you can meet me at this price, I'll buy the product from you.
I'm not willing to go as low as $92, Bob. I think you're getting a great deal at this price. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $92 and $110, which is $101. That's the lowest I can go.
